original_text: He may have started to worship false gods that I have commanded you not to worship. Perhaps he worships the sun, the moon or the stars.
korean_text: 가서 다른 신들을 섬겨 그것에게 절하며 내가 명령하지 아니한 일월성신에게 절한다 하자

sentences.original_text: He may have started to worship false gods
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 거짓 신들을 숭배하기 시작했을지도 모릅니다

sentences.original_text: that I have commanded you not to worship
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너희에게 숭배하지 말라고 명한 것들
